channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dropped pavement damaged due to flooding, 19th January
item.description:
Resident has called in as there has been a water leak up the road , this has been coming down the road for a month, leak has since been fixed by thames water but the drop curb in this area has sunk and puddles of water can been seen sitting out side the drives, would some one be able to attend and access the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Millwood Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole, 19th January
item.description:
Huge pothole, just by Lassa road! I think it's getting bigger by the day!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Spencer Gardens, Eltham

item.title: Van abandoned- 2 months +, 19th January
item.description:
Van has been left for few months. Must be abandoned. Got parking tickets and flat tyres now. Cator estate contacted the business some time ago assume they aren’t trading anymore as it’s still there.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Casterbridge Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Needs Pressure Wash After Thames Water Overflow, 19th January
item.description:
A couple weeks ago a Thames water pipe in the middle of the road was overflowing (for a couple days). This has caused a load of gunk/sediment/etc. to be deposited in the road particular towards the side; that Thames Water did not clean up. Needs a pressure wash or the sort to bring this down the drain (or similar), especially before it freezes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Strathleven Road, Stockwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog excrement around tree outside our house, 19th January
item.description:
In the last week around the lovely tree outside our 109 Bouverie Rd, there has been a dog fouling & 2 bags of dog faeces deposited. Please put up dog fouling penality warning notices along Bouverie Rd & Grayling Rd.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bouverie Road, Hackney, London

item.title: 2 lots of fly tipping, 19th January
item.description:
I witnessed a veolia workman allow a lady to leave many bags of stuff on the street and he and many other people then went through the bags and took some items, the veolia driver got in his van and left with some stuff in his cab and left the other rubbish on the path way outside the door of 219A. I have the reg plate of the veolia van and also other addresses from the Amazon parcels and black bags.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsdale Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
